bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in IEEE 8020 LANs
This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in 802 LANs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.1AB/REVD2.2, Dec 2007
